name: AnimalGame
0:
”Alexa start Animal Game”
”Alexa open Animal Game”
”Alexa begin Animal Game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal game
des:
When Alexa is asked to tell a random animal name, she picks one of the beautiful animals that she knows and tells you its name. Then you can imitate it for your friends and have a nice ice breaker. Who can make the best cat sound? Who can become the most dangerous lion of the jungle? You can vote the best performances with your friends and have a fun time. 

Your friends can guess which animal you are imitating if they didn't hear Alexa talking.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
